update.description:
Language updates.
Add harfbuzz.
Upgrade apcid to 2.0.22, Archive-Zip to 1.37, bash to 4.3, bind to 9.9.5, cairo to 1.12.16, coreutils to 8.22, db to 6.0.30, e2fsprogs to 1.42.9, ethtool to 3.13, fcron to 3.1.2, freetype to 2.5.3, glib to 2.40.0, gnupg to 1.4.16, iproute2 to 3.12.0, libgcrypt to 1.6.1, libgpg-error to 1.12, libnl to 3.2.24, libpng to 1.6.10, logrotate to 3.8.7, Net-DNS to 0.74, Net-SSLeay to 1.58, openldap to 2.4.39, openssh to 6.6p1, openssl to 1.0.1f, pango to 1.36.3, pcre to 8.34, procps to 3.3.9, psmisc to 22.21, readline to 6.3, sqlite to 3.8.4.2, squid to 3.3.12, squid-langpack to 20140220, tzdata to 2014b, ulogd to 2.0.3, util-linux to 2.24.1.
